name: This café will be the next big thing
name_original: This café will be the next big thing
description:
A little piece walking myself through some more mechanics that I started after the last bitsy jam I participated in.  The unfinished business jam sounded like the place to get this... clearly not finished exactly, but in a leavable state.  (There is no end screen, just leave when you're done.)

That is to say: wander around the house and the town - talk to friendly folks - have some tea! - collect your free gift - achieve level 10 and go upstairs? - support your local bookshop - listen to the band rehearse - battle a skeleton - make your own list of things to do next time...

this café will be the next big thing :)

Move and interact with arrow keys / swipe.  if you're on firefox and can't hear the music, you may need to Allow Autoplay audio on this website.

CREDITS:

  • animal sprites https://shriker.ca/free-bitsy-animal-sprites/
  • bitsymuse https://github.com/seleb/bitsy-hacks/blob/main/dist/bitsymuse.js / and candle's ui https://kool.tools/bitsy/tools/bitsymuse-ui/
  • enui's dungeon builder + sprites https://enui.itch.io/bitsy-dungeon-tiles
  • text entry inspired by brandonmakesthings https://brandonmakesthings.itch.io/a-bitsy-keyboard
